options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Scroll[/color] speed
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you move across the map.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Rotation[/color] speed: Horizontal
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you rotate left/right.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Rotation[/color] speed: Vertical
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you rotate up/down.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] speed: Hotkey
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you zoom in/out with your hotkeys.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] speed: Mouse wheel
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you zoom in/out with your mouse wheel.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] out distance
options.tooltip:
Set how far you can zoom out.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] in distance
options.tooltip:
Set how close you can zoom in.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Windowed mode[/color] screen width
options.tooltip:
Screen width in windowed mode.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color][color="220 185 70"]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Windowed mode[/color] screen height
options.tooltip:
Screen height in windowed mode.[color="255 0 0"]RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color][color="220 185 70"]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] Display time duration of replays
options.tooltip: Decide if you want to see the time duration of the replay above the top panel.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] Gatheres or Income/10s
options.tooltip:
Specify what to display next to the resource count.

[color="220 185 70"]Gatherers:[/color] Total number of units that are gathering and on their way to gather this resource.
[color="220 185 70"]Income/10s:[/color] Total number of resources income over 10 seconds.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] row color intensity
options.tooltip: Choose the color intensity for the rows.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]yawning idle[/color] from the start time of a game.
options.tooltip:
if used, the idle button can NOT be used anymore to find people who are idling. 

The Button then is for toggle the yawning sound, throughout the total playing time.

 the hotkeys to find idles, of course, still working.

change only has an effect from the next game

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]yawning idle[/color] frequency.
options.tooltip: pause in seconds beetween in seconds

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]yawning idle[/color] duration.
options.tooltip: how long your idle shoud yawning

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]EXPERIMENTAL: yawning idle rememer again[/color] rememer you much later again.
options.tooltip: if your idle stay very long, you have maybe forgot them, they could star yawning again

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]yawning Sound[/color]
options.tooltip: yawning Audio File

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]yawning: Hear all Players[/color]
options.tooltip: as an observer hear all players speak at the same time

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]yawning: Hear as observer (not implemented)[/color]
options.tooltip: Hear all also as observer (not recomandet)
